status_online: ✅ temptaking.ado.sg is back online You may now re-submit your previous request.
status_offline_response: ❌ temptaking.ado.sg is offline, so I can't respond to your request right now. I'll let you know when the website is back online.
website_error: An unknown error occurred while accessing temptaking.ado.sg. Please try again:
window_open_AM: It's %H:%M on %A, %d/%m/%y You are eligible for AM submission. Please enter your temperature in °C:
window_open_PM: It's %H:%M on %A, %d/%m/%y You are eligible for PM submission. Please enter your temperature in °C:
remind_offline: It's %H:%M on %A, %d/%m/%y ❌ temptaking.ado.sg is offline Reminders will resume once the website is back up.
no_text_error: This isn't a text message. Wake up your idea.
SAF100:

temptaking.ado.sg/group/<code>
SAF100_2:
Please enter your temptaking URL again: Format: 
temptaking.ado.sg/group/<code>

❌ This isn't a valid temptaking URL Expected format: 
temptaking.ado.sg/group/<code>
use_keyboard: Please choose a reply from this keyboard:
member_overflow: ❗This group has {} members. That's too many for me to display. Please type your name in exactly as it appears on the website:
member_overflow_wrong: ❌ "{}" isn't a member of your group. Wake up your idea and type your name correctly:
set_pin_1: ❗You have not set a pin yet. Please set a pin here
set_pin_2: ❗You still have not set a pin yet. Please set a pin here
invalid_pin: ❌ This isn't a valid pin. Please enter your pin again: Valid pin format: 0000
wrong_pin: ‼ You gave me the wrong pin. Wake up your idea. Please re-enter your pin:
already_submitted_AM: %A, %d/%m/%y — AM ✅ You already submitted {}°C Your next submission window opens this afternoon.
already_submitted_PM: %A, %d/%m/%y — PM ✅ You already submitted {}°C Your next submission window opens tomorrow morning.
old_user_AM: To re-submit, enter /forcesubmit To reset this bot, enter /start To configure reminders, enter /remind
old_user_PM: To re-submit, enter /forcesubmit To reset this bot, enter /start To configure reminders, enter /remind
invalid_temp: ❌ This isn't a valid temperature. Please re-enter your temperature in °C: Valid temperature format: 00.0
temp_outside_range: ❌ This isn't a valid temperature. Please re-enter your temperature in °C: Valid temperature range: 35.0 — 40.0
invalid_input: 👺 This isn't a valid request. Wake up your idea. If you wish to reset the bot, enter /start.
temp_submit_error: An unknown error occurred while submitting your temperature. You can try using the website to submit your temperature. To try re-submitting, enter /forcesubmit. To reset this bot at any time, enter /start. To configure reminders, enter /remind
fatal_error:
💀 A fatal error occurred. Please restart the setup by entering your temptaking URL: Format: 
temptaking.ado.sg/group/<code>
reminder_not_configured: You haven't configured your reminders yet. By default, hourly submission reminders begin at 00:01 and 12:01 daily. To reduce spam, you can customise the time from which hourly reminders begin.
reminder_existing_config: Existing reminder configuration: AM: {} onwards PM: {} onwards
reminder_successful_change: ✅ Reminders configured AM: {} onwards PM: {} onwards Disclaimer: Due to high user volume, reminders may be delayed by up to a few minutes.
invalid_reminder_time: ❌ This isn't a valid time. Please use one of the options generated for you:
